skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Heals this Champion by 20% of the damage dealt. 

Has a 40% chance of increasing the duration of 2 random debuffs on the target Champion by 1 turn.
skills.name: Thunderous Maul
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of removing 2 random buffs from all enemies. 

Has a 75% chance of removing all buffs from all enemies, even if this attack lands as a weak hit, if Jetni the Giant is on the same team. 

Also places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Crack the Sky
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Fully heals a target ally. 

Also places a [Block Damage] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Resounding Rally

skills.desc:
When attacked, has a 50% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff on the attacker for 2 turns. 

The chance increases to 100% if Jetni the Giant is on the same team.
skills.name: Trammel
